7   public class NamingRulesTest extends SimpleAggregatorTst {

9       @Before
10      public void setUp() {
11          addRule("naming", "AbstractNaming");

19          addRule("naming", "MethodWithSameNameAsEnclosingClass");
20          addRule("naming", "MisleadingVariableName");
21          addRule("naming", "NoPackage");
22          addRule("naming", "PackageCase");
23          addRule("naming", "ShortMethodName");
24          addRule("naming", "ShortVariable");
25          addRule("naming", "SuspiciousConstantFieldName");
26          addRule("naming", "SuspiciousEqualsMethodName");
27          addRule("naming", "SuspiciousHashcodeMethodName");
28          addRule("naming", "VariableNamingConventions");
